title: The Drought
description: A terrible drought has struck the magical land of Saphirra. Every lake and stream has dried up, and Ara, a young unicorn mare, has to leave her home in search of water. After suffering a heatstroke, she is rescued by a young boy who takes her into his village and promises to care for her. But, as water grows scarcer still, Ara realizes that she has to do something, or all of Saphirra will perish.Ara and her group of unlikely travelers take a dangerous journey up a once-said unclimbable mountain. They face many perils along the way, and even greater uncharted dangers wait at the peak. When things seem like they canâ€™t get any worse for Ara and her companions, more troubles arise. Unicorns all over Saphirra have disappeared without a trace. Is Ara truly the last one?
author: Emory R. Ivie
